name: Recycle Stitching Vector Plugin
title: Recycle Existing Stitching Vector
description: Apply existing stitching vector to an image collection.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for the Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: stitchRegex
inputs.description: Regular expression for filenames in the stitching vector.

inputs.name: collectionRegex
inputs.description: Regular expression for filenames in the image collection.

inputs.name: groupBy
inputs.description: Variables contained within a single stitching vector.

ui.title: Input image collection:
ui.description: Image collection to apply stitching vector against

ui.title: Stitch Regular Expression:
ui.description: The regular expression that will be used on file names in the stitching vector.

ui.title: Collection Regular Expression:
ui.description: The regular expression that will be used on files in the image collection.

ui.title: Group By:
ui.description: Variables contained in one stitching vector.
